## Before the Quiz

0.  Take a photo of your cheat sheet if you want it.
1.  🧹 Clear your desk of everything except a pen/pencil and your cheat sheet.
2.  🧢 Remove hats, hoods, and sunglasses.
3.  📱 All electronic devices (laptop, phone, airbuds, smart watch) should be remain in your bag for the entire class period.
4.  Spread out as much as possible.

## Individual Quiz

```{r}
countdown::countdown(25, top = 0)
```

::::: columns
::: {.column width="57%"}
1.  When you get a quiz, cover it with your cheat sheet and do not begin.
2.  Write your name on both pages.
3.  ⌛If you finish early, cover it with your cheat sheet.
4.  If you need to use the bathroom, bring phone and quiz to the front of the class.
:::

::: {.column width="43%"}
5.  ⌛If you finish early, please hold on to your quiz and wait.
6.  Keep your eyes on your own quiz.
7.  ❗You must stop writing when time is called or risk a 0.

Good luck! 🍀
:::
:::::

## Group Quiz

```{r}
countdown::countdown(15, top = 0)
```

::::: columns
::: {.column width="57%"}
1.  Form groups of 3 people, then ONE person raise your hand (to get your quiz).
2.  Be sure to write ALL group members names on the quiz on both pages.
3.  If you find yourself without a group, come to the front of class and we'll help you form one.
:::

::: {.column width="43%"}
4.  Your can start when you get your quiz.
5.  When done, bring your quiz and everyone's cheat sheets to a tutor or me. Then please leave the room quietly.

Good luck! 🍀
:::
:::::
